body_html:
Hey Carolzheng,

I'd suggest copying the file from /usr/local/cuda8.0/lib64 to whatever location you need it to be in. You can do it with the cp command in the Linux terminal if you're on Ubuntu.

I bet you could also make a symbolic link too.

Good luck.
body_text:
Hey Carolzheng,
I'd suggest copying the file from /usr/local/cuda8.0/lib64 to whatever location you need it to be in. You can do it with the cp command in the Linux terminal if you're on Ubuntu.
I bet you could also make a symbolic link too.
Good luck.
body:
Hey Carolzheng,

I'd suggest copying the file from /usr/local/cuda8.0/lib64 to whatever location you need it to be in. You can do it with the [cp command](https://www.computerhope.com/unix/ucp.htm) in the Linux terminal if you're on Ubuntu.

I bet you could also make a [symbolic link](https://kb.iu.edu/d/abbe) too.

Good luck.
